name: Little Heroes Game
description:
Little Heroes has 100 levels of pure fun. Connect Little Heroes images until you complete your mission. Think you got it, well new challenges keep coming up.

Features
- fun 100 Levels
- Connect Little Heroes Images to collect them
- Fun Missions you have to complete
- Use power ups like extra moves, live and bomb to help
- Play against friends in Game Center

Play Little Heroes Today.
